MU114.title: Rockferry
MU114.description: Debut album from the young Welsh soul siren.

MU116.title: Elephunk
MU116.description: LA hip hop crew's third album, full throttle funk.

MU115.title: Goodbye Yellow Brick Road
MU115.description: Original double album now single CD release, reckoned by some to be Sir Elton's finest, from rockers like Satuday Night's Alright for Fighting to the classis ballad Candle in the Wind.

MU224.title: Below the Salt
MU224.description: Maddy Prior leads on this carefully chosen selection of traditional folk songs.

MU506.title: Abraxas
MU506.description: Commercial breakthrough album for Santana showcasing their post-Woodstock talent at its best.

MU223.title: Twelve Dreams of Dr Sardonicus
MU223.description: Spitit\'s final and finest experimental album.

MU338.title: Achtung Baby
MU338.description: More techno-rock than stadium pop, this album marked a change of direction for U2.

MU335.title: Fisherman's Blues
MU335.description: Going back to their Celtic roots for these folk rockers, backed by fiddles and acoustic guitars.

MU332.title: The Delivery Man
MU332.description: Backed again by the Imposters, this is a concept album featuring a selection of fine guest appearances from the likes of Lucimda Williams.

MU777.title: Dead Man's Suit
MU777.description: Tuneful soft rock debut with some standout lyrics.

MU556.title: The Owl of Minerva
MU556.description: Ground breaking collection from Brighton based team, previously only available on Vinyl.

MU654.title: Surfer Rosa
MU654.description: Typically abrasive selection of guitar and vocal combinationsClassic.

MU501.title: Neon Bible
MU501.description: Second release from the Canadian folk rockers, easily passing the predecessor in scope and depth.

MU658.title: Separation Sunday
MU658.description: Play it loud - original take on classic rock. Recommended.

MU989.title: Blue
MU989.description: Introspective and highly personal, Joni Mitchell bares  her soul on this all time classic.

MU327.title: Solid Air
MU327.description: Landmark album crossing from the folky to free form, jazz improvisation. Conatining the all time great May You Never.

MU321.title: Couldn't Stand The Weather
MU321.description: The second album from the late and almented Vaughan, consolidating his position as a leading light of modern blues.

MU411.title: Enjoy The Melodic Sunshine
MU411.description: Hard to believe this Glasgow group can produce the sunniest West Coast rock and best harmonies since The Byrds

MU111.title: Live At Folsom Prison
MU111.description: Quintessential Cash, recorded live  at Folsom Prison. With his wife June Carter Cash.

MU555.title: Live at the Apollo
MU555.description: One of the greatest live albums of all time, from a performer at the peak of his career.

MU877.title: The Fat Of The Land
MU877.description: Third studio album, featuring the singles Firestarterand Breathe
